umm... it should be noted that Reminders are automated.  asking nicely to 
stop sending them is pointless, just wait until it goes away and delete them 
if you don't want to read them.  They're easy to recognize seeing as they all 
have the same subject and it starts with "Reminder"

--part1_6c.1b168101.29f4c9f1_boundary
